statements: SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_id, description FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE description LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, description FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC, price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' OR product_name LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, description FROM products WHERE price < 30 ORDER BY price ASC, product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_id, name, description FROM products ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM categories WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_name LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY category_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100
SELECT name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE name ILIKE 'a%' AND description IS NOT NULL
SELECT name, category_name FROM products JOIN categories ON products.product_id = categories.category_id
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM products
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT p.name, c.name FROM products p INNER JOIN product_categories pc ON p.id = pc.product_id INNER JOIN categories c ON pc.category_id = c.id;
SELECT id, COUNT(*) AS category_count FROM product_categories GROUP BY id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT name, description FROM products WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6) AND name LIKE '%Apple%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT p.name, c.name AS category FROM products p JOIN product_categories pc ON p.id = pc.product_id JOIN categories c ON pc.category_id = c.id WHERE c.name = 'Electronics' ORDER BY p.name ASC;

SELECT p.id, p.name, COUNT(pc.product_id) AS total_categories FROM products p LEFT JOIN product_categories pc ON p.id = pc.product_id GROUP BY p.id, p.name HAVING total_categories >= 2 ORDER BY total_categories DESC, p.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT p.name, c.category_name FROM products p JOIN product_categories pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id JOIN categories c ON pc.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, s.seller_name, s.location FROM products p JOIN sellers s ON p.product_id = s.seller_id;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT p.name, c.category_name FROM products p JOIN product_categories pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id JOIN categories c ON pc.category_id = c.category_id;

SELECT s.seller_name, COUNT(pc.product_id) AS total_products FROM sellers s LEFT JOIN products p ON s.seller_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN product_categories pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id GROUP BY s.seller_name ORDER BY total_products DESC;

SELECT p.name, p.price, c.category_name FROM products p JOIN product_categories pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id JOIN categories c ON pc.category_id = c.category_id WHERE c.category_name = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT name, price, description FROM products WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC, name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name LIMIT 10;
SELECT p.name, c.name AS category FROM products p JOIN product_categories pc ON p.id = pc.product_id JOIN categories c ON c.id = pc.category_id WHERE c.id = 3 ORDER BY p.price DESC;

SELECT o.id AS order_id, c.name AS customer_name, SUM(oi.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.id JOIN order_items oi ON oi.order_id = o.id GROUP BY order_id, customer_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT p.name, COUNT(oi.order_id) AS total_orders FROM products p LEFT JOIN order_items oi ON p.id = oi.product_id GROUP BY p.name ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
